# Data Source (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# Get information about the Cognito User Pool
data "vy_cognito_info" "this" {}

# Use the Cognito info in your configuration
output "cognito_user_pool_id" {
  value = data.vy_cognito_info.this.user_pool_id
}

output "cognito_domain" {
  value = data.vy_cognito_info.this.domain
}
```

## Schema

### Read-Only

- `auth_url` (String) The URL where users can authenticate
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `issuer` (String) The URI for the issuer
- `jwks_url` (String) The URL for the /.well-known/jwks.json
- `open_id_url` (String) The URL for the /.well-known/openid-configuration
